title: Perfumes of France
brief_description: The famous perfume of France, from flower to bottle. The cultivation of flower around Grasse in the south of France and the extraction of the essential oils; blending and testing of new perfumes; bottling and marketing the great perfumes.
description: The famous perfume of France, from flower to bottle. The cultivation of flower around Grasse in the south of France and the extraction of the essential oils; blending and testing of new perfumes; bottling and marketing the great perfumes.
